des:
Take control of your lights, blinds, outlets, and air purifiers. You can choose a light for early mornings, another for late evenings and a third for cooking or working at home, all by using only your voice. Alexa voice commands let you dim, turn off and on and switch your TRÅDFRI bulbs from warm to cold light. You can control blinds with your voice, too — open and lower them all the way, or to your preferred percentage. 
 
TO GET STARTED: 
Use DIRIGERA hub and IKEA Home smart app to set up your system. Open the app and go to the settings menu and follow the instructions to activate Amazon Alexa. 
Then you can discover your devices by saying “Alexa, discover my devices” or by using the Alexa app. 
Here is a handy list of some of the most common voice commands you can use with IKEA Home smart skill for Amazon Alexa to control lighting, blinds, outlets, and air purifiers in your home: 

• Alexa, open the bedroom blinds 
• Alexa, lower the blinds to 40% 
• Alexa, dim the living room lights to 25% 
• Alexa, make the living room lights softer 
• Alexa, brighten the kitchen lights 
• Alexa, brighten the kitchen lights to 75% 
• Alexa, make the kitchen lights warmer 
• Alexa, turn on the coffee maker 
• Alexa, turn on the air purifier
• Alexa, is the bedroom window open?
